title: Final refactoring verification and line count achievement
description:
**As a** Consoul developer
**I want** to verify all refactoring is complete and achieve <2,000 line target
**So that** SOUL-249 goal is met and app.py is maintainable pure UI code

**Context:**
This is the final verification ticket for SOUL-249. After completing SOUL-265, 267, 268, and 269, this ticket:
- Verifies all refactoring is complete
- Identifies any remaining opportunities
- Ensures <2,000 line target is achieved
- Documents final architecture
- Performs comprehensive integration testing

**Dependencies:**
- SOUL-265: ConversationService audit complete
- SOUL-267: ToolService integration complete
- SOUL-268: ModelService integration complete
- SOUL-269: TUI data models implemented

**Current Progress (estimated after previous tickets):**
- Starting: 5,881 lines
- SOUL-265 reduction: ~300 lines → 5,581 lines
- SOUL-267 reduction: ~200 lines → 5,381 lines
- SOUL-268 reduction: ~350 lines → 5,031 lines
- SOUL-269 reduction: ~150 lines → 4,881 lines

**Remaining Opportunities:**
- Extract conversation loading logic to service

- Simplify widget initialization

**Acceptance Criteria:**

**Given** All sub-tickets are complete
**When** I measure app.py line count
**Then** It is <2,000 lines

**Given** app.py should be pure UI
**When** I review all methods
**Then** No business logic exists (only widget orchestration)

**Given** TUI should use SDK services
**When** I check SDK imports
**Then** Only service layer and TUI models are imported

**Given** All refactoring is done
**When** I run full integration tests
**Then** All TUI features work without regression

**Given** Architecture is complete
**When** I review separation of concerns
**Then** Clear boundaries exist: SDK (business) vs TUI (presentation)

**Testing Considerations:**
- **Comprehensive manual testing:**
  - Message sending (text, multimodal)
  - Tool execution (approval, auto-approved)
  - Model switching
  - Conversation history
  - Cost tracking
  - Error handling
  - All keyboard shortcuts
  - All modals and screens
- Performance testing (no slowdown from refactoring)
- Memory usage check
- Startup time measurement

**Final Deliverables:**
